channel.title: Slayer Idea
channel.description: How hard would it be to add a NPC that when you talk to it, it asks you if you want to spawn the monster that your slayer task has asked you to do. It would be much easier than spawning a whol bunch of monsters accross the whole map.

item.title: Slayer Idea
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Pzezima2, post:1, topic:431258”]How hard would it be to add a NPC that when you talk to it,
it asks you if you want to spawn the monster that your slayer task has asked you to do.
It would be much easier than spawning a whol bunch of monsters accross the whole map.[/quote]

Not hard at all. Just a simple 2 line option interface; if yes then spawn the npc, if not, still assign the task.

Read full topic
